p: Renal parameters (urea and creatinine) were examined to explore renal function. Alanine aminotransferase (ALAT) and aspartate aminotransferase (ASAT) were considered in the exploration of the liver function ( Table 2). Analysis of the data in this table indicates that animals treated with 400 mg/kg and 800 mg/kg of the plants studied showed a significant increase in uremia ( p < 0.05). However, no significant influence on creatinemia of animals was noted ( p > 0.05).
